Reviews.Title: Very satisfied with these cameras!
Reviews.Author: James A. Hunt "Jim Hunt"
Reviews.Content: I've purchased several of these cameras. They are easy to install and they work great. In this price range, it would be hard to find a better camera.

ProductInfo.Features:
Compatible with any Q-See DVR
Wide Angle Lens for large field of view
Up to 65ft. of Night Vision per Camera
520 TV Lines Resolution; 1/3" Sony CCD image sensor
Weatherproof for indoor or outdoor use
ProductInfo.Name: Digital Peripheral Solutions Q-See QSC1336N Weatherproof High Resolution CCD Camera
